thyme.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window
thyme.description: A woody herb with small leaves and a strong aroma

parsley.ideal_sunlight: Indirect or filtered light, east/west-facing window
parsley.description: A biennial herb used for garnish and flavoring

basil.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window
basil.description: A fragrant culinary herb with bright green leaves

chives.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window
chives.description: Grass-like herb with mild onion flavor

jade_plant_mini.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window
jade_plant_mini.description: Small succulent with thick, glossy leaves

echeveria.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window

haworthia.ideal_sunlight: Indirect or filtered light, east/west-facing window
haworthia.description: Small striped succulent, ideal for low light

african_violet.ideal_sunlight: Indirect or filtered light, east/west-facing window
african_violet.description: Compact flowering plant with velvety leaves

begonia.ideal_sunlight: Indirect or filtered light, east/west-facing window
begonia.description: Colorful foliage and blooms, popular indoors

kalanchoe.ideal_sunlight: Bright direct sunlight near south-facing window
